pullrequest.title: Add option to run code_check on files modified by parent commit

content.raw:
Am I using this wrong?

```
jackie@hermes:~/code/gazebo$ ./tools/bitbucket_pullrequests --check
WARNING: The rest_client gem is deprecated and will be removed from RubyGems. Please use rest-client gem instead.
checking pull request 1506, branch apply_force_dialog
./tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:163:in `[]=': regexp not matched (IndexError)
	from ./tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:163:in `block in getFilesFromDiff'
	from ./tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:160:in `each'
	from ./tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:160:in `getFilesFromDiff'
	from ./tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:154:in `getPullRequestFiles'
	from ./tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:193:in `checkPullRequest'
	from ./tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:283:in `block in <main>'
	from ./tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:282:in `each'
	from ./tools/bitbucket_pullrequests:282:in `<main>'
```
